#summary How to setup and run Watch Folder
#labels Phase-Support

= Requirements =

 * Mozilla Firefox 
 * [https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/1146 ScreenGrab ] Firefox Addon

Set up ZScreen Options as follows: 

[http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25501373/ZScreen/2011-06/Screenshot-2011-06-30_10.12.38.png]

= Getting Started =
== Using Mozilla Firefox addon ==

Enable Add-on Bar:

[http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25501373/ZScreen/2011-06/Screenshot-2011-06-30_10.20.35.png]

In Mozilla Firefox, click the Grab icon in the bottom right corner: 

[http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25501373/ZScreen/2011-06/Screenshot-2011-06-30_10.12.23.png]

 * Save > Complete Page/Frame...

 * Save to the Watch Folder of ZScreen 

== Using Google Chrome ==
 * Install an appropriate extension that saves web page image to file: 
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/search?hl=en&q=screenshot

 * Save to the Watch Folder of ZScreen
